alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana County through 515 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Vado. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vado, Berino, Mesquite and High Valley. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 148 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin
